about:
Hello, I'm Samuel Andika and I'm Front-end Developer.


I'm from Indonesia, based in Jakarta Selatan and I have been working as a freelance Front-End Developer since 2019 and as a freelance UI/UX Designer since 2021 with my team. I have my own developer team called Sleeping At Party!.

 I've worked for clothing brands, music label, and others personal request like impostor for university students. I've been freelancing for the last 4 years, and right now I am looking forward to collaborate with you!
